blogPost.excerpt: Base64.ai is a cloud API that can extract data, photos, and signatures from all types of documents. We have prebuilt models for IDs, driver licenses, passports, visas, invoices, and many more document types. The integration is only a single API call.
blogPost.body: Base64.ai is a cloud API that can extract data, photos, and signatures from all types of documents. We have prebuilt models for IDs, driver licenses, passports, visas, invoices, and many more document types. The integration is only a single API call.
blogPost.title: Base64.ai - Extract text, data, photos and more from all types of docs
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Base64.ai是一种云API，可以从所有类型的文档中提取数据、照片和签名。我们预建了ID、驾照、护照、签证、发票和更多文档类型的模型。集成只是一次API调用。
localize.tagline: 从所有类型的文档中提取文本、数据、照片等

localize.description: Base64.ai是一種雲API，可以從所有類型的文檔中提取數據、照片和簽名。我們預建了ID、駕照、護照、簽證、發票和更多文檔類型的模型。集成只是一次API調用。
localize.tagline: 從所有類型的文檔中提取文本、數據、照片等

previous.excerpt: Tails is the ultimate TailwindCSS Page Creator. Need a website for your next great idea? Tails is the perfect tool to creating a beautiful landing page. Over 120 design blocks you can mix and match to craft the perfect landing page for your next project.
previous.title: Tails - The ultimate TailwindCSS drag'n drop page creator

localize.description: Tails是终极TailwinCSS页面创建器。需要一个网站来展示你的下一个好点子吗？Tails是创建漂亮登录页面的完美工具。超过120个设计模块，您可以混合搭配，为您的下一个项目制作完美的登录页。
Tails是終極TailwinCSS頁面創建器。需要一個網站來展示你的下一個好點子嗎？Tails是創建漂亮登錄頁面的完美工具。超過120個設計模塊，您可以混合搭配，爲您的下一個項目製作完美的登錄頁。

next.excerpt: Not everyone has fast internet. If your page loads very slowly, your users will have less time to browse your site and your bounce rate will increase. This causes you to lose your customers.
next.title: Screpy 2.0 - All-In-One SEO and website analysis tool

localize.description: 并不是每个人都有快速的互联网。如果您的页面加载非常慢，您的用户浏览您的站点的时间将会减少，而您的跳出率将会增加。这会导致您失去客户。
localize.tagline: 一体式SEO和网站分析工具

localize.description: 並不是每個人都有快速的互聯網。如果您的頁面加載非常慢，您的用戶瀏覽您的站點的時間將會減少，而您的跳出率將會增加。這會導致您失去客戶。
localize.tagline: 一體式SEO和網站分析工具
